OpenSim::AbstractMarker

AbstractMarker Class Reference

#include <AbstractMarker.h>

Inheritance diagram for AbstractMarker:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

An abstract class that specifies the interface for a marker (a passive motion capture marker that is fixed to a body segment).

Author:
Peter Loan
Version:
1.0
